5. 이용자의 권리

6. 개인정보 보호책임자

7. 변경 공지
본 방침은 2025년 10월 1일부터 적용됩니다.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content:
XAI KOREA (hereinafter referred to as "the Company") values your personal information and complies with the Personal Information Protection Act.

1. Items and Purposes of Personal Information Collection
Collected Items: Name, Email, Inquiry Details
Purpose of Collection: Responding to service inquiries, customer management, delivery of notices

2. Period of Retention and Use of Personal Information
Personal information is destroyed immediately after the purpose of use is achieved or upon membership withdrawal, but may be stored for up to 3 years in accordance with relevant laws.

3. Provision of Personal Information to Third Parties
The Company does not provide personal information to third parties without the user's consent.

4. Entrustment of Processing
The Company entrusts only the tasks necessary for service operation such as email services (Gmail), web hosting (AWS), and data analysis (Google Analytics).

5. Rights of Users
Users can request to view, correct, or delete their personal information at any time. For such requests, please contact contact@xaikorea.ai.kr.

6. Privacy Officer
Name: Jaehwan Kim, CEO
Email: contact@xaikorea.ai.kr

7. Notice of Changes
This policy is effective as of October 1, 2025.

XAI KOREA complies with the Personal Information Protection Act and will never misuse user data for unauthorized purposes.
